resources.string: By Jim Eckerlein, 2017\nProgrammed for my school work.\nThe JavaScript evaluator uses the high-performance J2V8 engine, a Java binding to Google\'s V8 engine
A JavaScript editor and execution suite for Android
Edit your script. Tap a key to write its primary text, hold to write the secondary one.
Run your script. Leaving the run tab will immediately stop the script execution.
